topics.body:
[bq="HJSDGCE"]I wonder what Sari Sumdac (TF:A) would look like in real life (TF1,2 and 3).

Imagine if Sam Witwicky returned to college and while eating lunch, he meets a new girl who just entered for the semester. 

She then sits down at the picnic bench to eat lunch, she introduces herself "Hi, nice to meet ha. Name's Sari"

"Sari Sumdac."

He eyes then glow blue with the small mechanized movements like the intro for Sentinal Prime in TF3.[/bq]
